vps_configuration_veeam_order_step1_load: An error has occurred loading the information.
vps_configuration_veeam_order_step1_info: For the first payment, you will be invoiced pro rata for the number of days remaining from your VPS renewal date.
vps_configuration_veeam_order_backup_inf: With the Automated Backup feature, you can restore your VPS at any time. On your dashboard, you will find 7 VPS backups (excluding additional disks) corresponding to the last 7 days of use.
vps_configuration_veeam_order_schedule_i: You can schedule backups at the times that are most convenient for you.
vps_configuration_veeam_order_step1_info: The service will then be billed monthly, at a price of {{price}} ex. VAT/{{duration}}.
vps_configuration_veeam_order_step1_ques: Order Automated Backup option for the {{ serviceName }} VPS?
vps_configuration_veeam_order_step1_id: To confirm your request, please accept the terms and conditions and click "Next" below.
vps_configuration_veeam_order_step1_cont: I confirm that I have read and understood the following:
vps_configuration_veeam_order_step2_bc: The purchase order has been generated.
vps_configuration_veeam_order_step2_cont: To confirm your order, please click the "Pay" button below.
vps_configuration_veeam_order_step2_expl: Please note that a period of approximately 2 hours from your payment being accepted will be necessary for activation of the option to take effect in the Web Control Panel.
A new tab will open, and you will be automatically redirected to the OVH payment interface.
vps_configuration_veeam_order_fail: An error occurred on requesting to sign up to the Automated backup option.
vps_configuration_veeam_order_success: To complete your order, please follow the instructions listed in the new tab that has opened. If no new tab has appeared, please click here.
vps_configuration_veeam_order_load_error: An error has occurred loading the Automated Backup order information.
No Automated Backup orders have been found for this VPS.
